title: what server for playing lol in malasyia?
body: On holiday in Malaysia, was wondering if oceania is the best server for the location. I played a game before with a constant 300 ping :/

replies.body: Your answer is to NOT play. Honestly, if you can't stop playing for a couple of weeks while you're travelling, I don't know how you're going to stop for work.

You are going on holidays for a few weeks and you can't stop playing League for that long?






Neither can I. Sup :)
